name: Casual & not so Casual Hikers
description: We offer more than shorter and easier hikes, or longer and more challenging hikes. We also offer opportunity for connections.

name: 40+ Crowd
description: Hikes and other Outings of varying degrees of difficulty. From strolls around reservoirs to mild hikes in the Springs area (sometimes Denver/Boulder and points west) to more challenging destinations.

name: Mountain Trails Hiking Club
description: If you enjoy healthy exercise in the outdoors and meeting new people, then Mountain Trails Hiking Club is just for you.
